long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whenever you send a link to someone on LinkedIn DMs - Solulu tells you when they click on that link.

Whether you’re a sales rep, or a job seeker, know who clicked your links and when.

You can send links like Calendly links, sales & marketing documents, resumes and portfolio links, etc.

It’s free to download and use!

How to use?

🔸 Click the “Add to Chrome” button and pin it to your toolbar.
🔸 Log into your account.
🔸 Send messages normally on LinkedIn. If it has a link, Solulu will convert it into a trackable link for that contact.
🔸 You will get notified whenever that prospect clicks on that link, so you can follow up on time, with the right message.
